item.description:
Popcorn und Film! und Pizza, Salat und Nachtisch
Some of us have seen this excellent Oscar-winning film but would like to see it again in a German atmosphere. We will have ample time before and after to speak German.
There is a long stretch between Meetup weeks this month; let's not forget our German! We are getting together to see this film auf Deutsch! (with subtitles). Come see it with us and enjoy discussing it in German! We welcome newcomers and those of you we haven't seen in a while. Ich hoffe,einige von Ihnen zu sehen, die in eine Weile nicht gewesen sind.
Wir werden nach (oder wahrend des Filmes) ein leichtes Abendessen teilen.
Bitte RSVP
Danke
item.name: Film "Das Leben der Anderen (The Lives of Others)
